name: Improved Dark theme for new Twitch look
description:
Improved dark mode for new Twitch look. Fixed up chat in vods, made it look almost exactly like the live chat. Fixed ffz bug where ffz would remove left padding from messages in vod chats.
* Font size changes
* Chat font set to Helvetica
* Some white text little bit greyer
* Lighter dark mode, easy on eyes
* Chat fixes
* Subscribe, Follow, Chat buttons little darker, aren't that bright no more.
additional_info:
* Made Helvetica as chat font
* Set the highlight color to the default from the purple
* Fixed for new Twitch UI
